discrip: This soothing lotion with 1% skin protectant colloidal oatmeal helps relieve minor skin irritation and itching caused by eczema. Free of parabens, fragrances and steroids, this gentle moisturizing lotion is dermatologist tested and accepted by the National Eczema Association to be suitable for sensitive, eczema prone skin.

Defends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity, including a weakened skin barrier, irritation, roughness, tightness and dryness.

prodName: Gentle Clear Clarifying Acne Cream Cleanser
discrip: This gentle cream-to-lather formula deep cleans to clear and soothe breakouts in acne-prone, sensitive skin without drying. Balanced formula is specially formulated with acne-fighting salicylic acid plus soothing aloe and white tea extract to nourish skin.

This lightweight moisturizer with acne-fighting salicylic acid, helps clear and prevent breakouts while soothing acne-prone, sensitive skin. It helps to absorb excess oil and provides a matte finish for softer, smoother skin. After 1 week, 89% of consumers said this moisturizer leaves their skin feeling hydrated and nourished.

This milky-gel serum with 0.5% salicylic acid improves the appearance of breakouts in just 3 days. With 24-hour hydration, it is formulated with soothing succinic acid to resurface skin and improve the appearance of uneven skin tone.
This sensitive skin-friendly serum is formulated with 12% vitamins and antioxidants to defend against surface free radicals while our GentleBright complex reduces the signs of photoaging.

prodName: Sheer Mineral Sunscreen Face Liquid Broad Spectrum SPF 50
discrip: An ultra-lightweight, 100% mineral active sunscreen that reflects both UVA and UVB rays to help prevent sunburn. This formula dries with a matte finish, making it ideal for application under makeup or for daily wear by itself.
